group_1.textRight: Welcome![chara:301901:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]

group_1.textLeft: Right... [chara:300701:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json]I've been waiting... @I mean, welcome.

group_1.textRight: That's it?!
You could say,@"Why are you stealing my line!"
That was the perfect chance for @a witty comeback!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, yeah... @[chara:300701:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_000.exp.json]Sorry, sorry...

group_1.textRight: Geeze!@You always leave me hanging!

group_1.textLeft: (I don't know if anyone @could deal with your jokes...)
The seat by the window is open.

group_1.textRight: Okaaay.

group_1.textLeft: Ah, there it is! The rebel of Japan's soft@drink world: The so-called "cream soda"!

group_1.textRight: Huh? "Rebel"?@What are you talking about?

group_1.textLeft: Think about all the drinks we put ice@cream into!
We call a coffee float a coffee float, right?

group_1.textRight: Yeah.

group_1.textLeft: And a cola float is a cola float. @Makes sense!
Orange soda floats are [chara:301901:motion_200]orange floats,@because of course they are!
So, given all that...
Why does the melon soda float@get to call itself a "cream soda"?

group_1.textRight: Ah, I see your point.

group_1.textLeft: I'm telling you, it's a little rebel!
Look at this little show-off!@What's it got to prove, huh?!

group_1.textRight: ... *Ahem*

group_1.textLeft: On top of that, they're often served@with a cherry on top of them...!

group_1.textRight: Mind lowering your voice?@Just a little bit? Sorry.

group_1.textLeft: Whoops! [chara:301901:motion_300:cheek_1:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json]Oh, geeze, I'm sorry...!@Was I getting loud?

group_1.textRight: Well, we are a nice and old, cozy cafe...
Our customers also tend to be a bit older,@you see.
So we do our best to keep the volume down.

group_1.textLeft: Ah, got it, got it! @[chara:301901:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json]Totally understand.
Don't scare the old dudes. No sudden @noises. It all makes sense, really.
We wouldn't want to give them all a heart@attack, now would we!

group_1.textRight: What are you—
Hrmrm! *Ahem!*[chara:800900:effect_emotion_angry_0][se:7219_strain]
I-I'm terribly sorry, sir!

group_1.textLeft: Hngah! [chara:301901:cheek_1:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]Sorry!

group_1.textRight: Heh...hehe! [chara:300701:motion_1]Stop...!
Just try to be quieter@when you're loud, okay?

group_1.textLeft: Be quieter when I'm loud?!@That is literally impossible!

group_1.textRight: Just don't think about it too hard.
That's one of your better qualities,@after all.

group_1.textLeft: What do you mean,@[chara:301901:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json]one of my "better qualities"?!
Oh, I see... You want to be loud @and get these oldies angry at you?!

group_1.textRight: No, no... It's not your volume I admire.

group_1.textLeft: Then...what is it?

group_1.textRight: You're just this endless well of happiness...
It's that brightness that just draws@everyone to you...
That power of yours is what makes @you special...
...It's what I admire most about you.@Your ability to shine a light on everything.

group_1.textLeft: To shine...a light on...everything?

group_1.textRight: Yeah.
I just think you're awesome.
